配.definition: to join; to fit; to mate; to mix; to match; to deserve; to make up (a prescription); to allocate

配件.definition: component; part; fitting; accessory; replacement part

配伍.definition: to blend two or more medicines; compatibility (of herbal remedies, medicines)

配備.definition: to allocate; to provide; to outfit with

配合.definition: matching; fitting in with; compatible with; to correspond; to fit; to conform to; rapport; to coordinate with; to act in concert with; to cooperate; to become man and wife; to combine parts of machine

配售.definition: to ration merchandise (esp. food in times of shortages)

配型.definition: to check for compatibility (for an organ transplant)

配套.definition: to form a complete set; compatible; matching; complementary

配對.definition: to pair up; to match up; to form a pair (e.g. to marry); to mate; matched pair

配戴.definition: to put on; to wear (mouthguard, contact lenses, hearing aid etc)

配料.definition: ingredients (in a cooking recipe); to mix materials according to directions

配方.definition: prescription; cooking recipe; formulation; completing the square (to solve quadratic equation, math.)

配方法.definition: completing the square (method of solving quadratic equation, math.)

配有.definition: to be equipped with; to come with (sth)

配樂.definition: to create music for a movie or stage production; to dub music onto a soundtrack; incidental music; soundtrack music

配比.definition: to mix ingredients in the appropriate proportions; mixing ratio; proportion of the different ingredients in a blend

配發.definition: to issue; to distribute; to publish along with

配眼鏡.definition: to have a pair of prescription glasses made

配置.definition: to deploy; to allocate; configuration; allocation

配裝.definition: to install; to fit; to load goods (on ships etc)

配製.definition: to compound (medicines etc); to prepare (by mixing ingredients); to concoct

配角.definition: supporting role; minor role; (of actors) to perform together

配貨.definition: to put together an order of goods

配送.definition: to put together an order and deliver it (i.e. 配貨|配货[pei4 huo4] and 送貨|送货[song4 huo4]); to deliver (goods)

配鏡.definition: to dispense or fit eyewear based on an optical prescription
